content.Description: Glob expression where the files are located. Stream names will be extracted from the file name.
The root of the filesystem to read from.
Whether to proceed reading the file even if the memofile is not present.
S3 configuration.
The AWS key ID.
The AWS secret key.
The S3 endpoint URL.
GCS configuration.
OAuth 2.0 token for GCS.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
Config for the Faker instance variable fake used within map expressions. Only applicable if the plugin specifies faker as an addtional dependency (through the singer-sdk faker extra or directly).
Value to seed the Faker generator for deterministic output: https://faker.readthedocs.io/en/master/#seeding-the-generator
One or more LCID locale strings to produce localized output for: https://faker.readthedocs.io/en/master/#localization
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
Specifies the format and compression of the batch files.
Format to use for batch files.
Compression format to use for batch files.
Defines the storage layer to use when writing batch files
Root path to use when writing batch files.
Prefix to use when writing batch files.
